item.title: I am not a N00b! - Telling vCenter to stop showing you getting started pages!
item.description: I should have found this years ago. Like most of you reading this I get bugged by vCenter presuming this is my first Rodeo, as they say. Everytime you go to a new Datacentre/Cluster/Folder/VM* (Delete as appropriate) it gives me the Getting Started pages. So today I found the off switches: For C# Client Select Edit > Client Settings Select the General tab Deselect the Show Getting Started Tabs check box and click OK For the Web Client
